name: Hero Fall
description:
(Let me know if the game works as it's supposed to)

CONTROLS:

Left and Right Arrows inside levels

Space/Enter/Z to Jump off a cliff!

R - Restart Level

P - Pause Level (and go back to Title Screen)

UP, DOWN, LEFT, ARROW Keys while in the Overworld Map

S - Save Progress while in the Overworld Map

Can you beat the 27 levels, let's see how you do!

FULL DEVELOPED GAME COULD INCLUDE:

Overworld

More Enemies

More and Bigger Levels

Some kind of plot story

Boss Fights?

I'm counting on you guys!

Made in RPGM MV

HERO FALL, a game made for the IGMC 2018 using assets from my upcoming/first ARPG game "HERO STAFF" (you can check the progress of that game here in the forum)

https://forums.rpgmakerweb.com/index.php?threads/hero-staff-my-upcoming-8-bit-ad...

AP

Pixelent Games
